summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a Fircosoft alert related to Caroline Sophie Camille Lang. The alert was reviewed by AML Compliance and determined to be a false positive. The email discusses Caroline Lang's roles and connections, including her position at Sotheby's and her status as a politically exposed person (PEP).

persons.name: Vijay-A Sawant
persons.context: Vijay-A Sawant is seeking updated approval for a Fircosoft alert concerning Caroline Lang.

persons.name: Carl Timcke
persons.context: Carl Timcke reviewed the Fircosoft alert for Caroline Lang and cleared it as a false positive.

persons.name: Caroline Sophie Camille Lang
persons.context: Caroline Lang is identified as the subject of the Fircosoft alert and is noted for her roles at Sotheby's and as a PEP.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is copied on the email regarding the Fircosoft alert.

persons.name: Bradley Gillin
persons.context: Bradley Gillin is also copied on the email regarding the Fircosoft alert.

persons.name: Jack Lang
persons.role: Former member of the French Legislature
persons.context: Jack Lang is mentioned as Caroline Lang's father, contributing to her status as a PEP.

connections.description: Caroline Lang is the daughter of Jack Lang, which contributes to her status as a politically exposed person.
Vijay-A Sawant is seeking approval from Carl Timcke, who is an AML Compliance Officer.
Bradley Gillin is copied on the correspondence involving Carl Timcke regarding the Fircosoft alert.
Vijay-A Sawant and Bradley Gillin are both involved in the KYC process and are part of the same team.

events.title: Fircosoft Alert for Caroline Lang
events.description: A Fircosoft alert was generated for Caroline Lang, which was later reviewed and cleared by AML Compliance.

keyFacts: Caroline Sophie Camille Lang is a Chairman at Sotheby's and is involved with The Pierre Trust.
The Fircosoft alert generated for Caroline Lang was cleared as a false positive by AML Compliance.
Caroline Lang is considered a politically exposed person due to her father's political background.
The email correspondence involves multiple individuals from Deutsche Bank's AML compliance team.
